mapper.select: SELECT inform_num, user_name, title, contents, country, hits, rating, reg_date FROM inform ORDER BY inform_num DESC, reg_date DESC
SELECT inform_num, user_name, title, contents, country, hits, rating, reg_date FROM inform WHERE country=#{country} ORDER BY inform_num DESC, reg_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inform ( user_id, user_name, title, contents, country, rating, reg_date ) VALUES ( #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{country}, #{rating}, NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE inform SET hits=hits+1 WHERE inform_num=#{inform_num}
UPDATE inform SET title=#{title}, contents=#{contents}, rating=#{rating}, reg_date=NOW() WHERE inform_num = #{inform_num}
